resources.string: To unpin this screen, press and hold Home and the Power button at the same time.
To unpin this screen, press and hold Home and the Power button at the same time.
Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.\n\nTo unpin, press and hold Home and the Power button at the same time.
Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.\n\nTo unpin, press and hold Home and the Power button at the same time.
